name: Static Restaurant Site Project
summary: Built single-page Bootstrap site with AJAX + JSON, handling dynamic data and responsive design for optimal user experience.
description: A dynamic single-page restaurant website built with Bootstrap framework, featuring AJAX-powered dynamic content loading, JSON data handling, and fully responsive design for seamless user experience across all devices.
impact: Implemented dynamic content loading with AJAX
Achieved responsive design across all device sizes
Successfully handled JSON data for menu and content

images.caption: Bootstrap-powered restaurant website with responsive layout
